name: Districts include archipelagic waters, etc.
text:
Each of the districts includes archipelagic waters and smaller islands adjacent thereto. [L 1909, c 84, §2; RL 1925, §145; RL 1935, §7621; RL 1945, §152; RL 1955, §10-2; HRS ; am L 1980, c 163, §2]
 
Cross References
 
  Territorial waters, see note to Const. art. XV, §1.
